title: Perform Cycle Count with Mobile Scanner
description: A warehouse operator uses a handheld scanner to perform a cycle count task, guided by the system.

tasks.description: The operator logs into the scanner and requests a new cycle count task.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system assigns a location to be counted and displays it on the scanner.

tasks.description: The operator navigates to the location and scans the location's barcode to verify they are in the right place.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the location is correct.

tasks.description: The operator scans the item's barcode and enters the quantity they have physically counted.
tasks.expected_outcome: The count is entered into the system via the scanner.

tasks.description: The system confirms the count is complete and assigns the next location to be counted.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator is seamlessly guided to their next task.
